title: Trina's Kids Foundation presents Runway Wonderland 2015
desc: You are cordially invited to attend the 2nd Annual Runway Wonderland holiday charity event  benefiting the Boys & Girls Clubs Thursday, December 10 th  2015 at? Hubble Studio? 545 S Clarence St. Los Angeles, CA 90033? 8:00 p.m. The red carpet event will be hosted by  Terrence J,  with? special performnces by  Tyga & Pia Mia,? ?a fashion show featuring couture designer  Michael Costello , celebrities walking down the runway, ?and much more! Please join us to celebrate this spectacular fundraiser event and help bring a happy holiday to children in need.  RSVP :  www.runway-wonderland2015.eventbrite.com?
